title: Leading cigarette brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 , by sales value
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
Month Sterling has the highest Sales value in million GBP and Windsor has the lowest Sales value in million GBP.
The Sales value in million GBP of Month Windsor is 3.27% smaller than the maximum value at Sterling.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
The Sales value in million GBP is highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
Month Sterling has the highest Sales value in million GBP and Windsor has the lowest Sales value in million GBP.
The Sales value in million GBP of Month Windsor is 3.27% smaller than the maximum value at Sterling.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales value in million GBP in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Month Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Month is 461.9.
Month Mayfair has the second highest value for Sales value in million GBP.
The maximum Month Sterling has got 3.27 times higher Sales value in million GBP than the minimum Month Windsor.
Sales value in million GBP at Month Sterling is 1511.3 , second place is Mayfair at 1046.1, and thirdly is Lambert and Butler at 787.7.
The Sales value in million GBP has declined over the past 10 Months.
The average Sales value in million GBP in all 10 Months is 775.37.
The Sales value in million GBP is 7753.7 if we add up values of all Months.
